data.message: He's a hate preaching pos needs to grow up and stop bad mouthing potus lots of dipshit Democrats don't like him but remember a fuck of a lot of smart people hated Obama but didn't act like bitches and hateful people who are hell bent on destroying there own country ,come live in Canada where we wait everyday to here how our drama teaching fuchead is destroying our country you fucks are lucky to have a person fighting for the people we see his accomplishments and the B's spewing mainstream media is pushing but yet you still believe ,braindead
